channel.title: AncientBlitz! Bringing back Epicurus| Daily Updates| Grand Exchange
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://ancientblitz.info/forums/images/dragonbyte_mmogaming/misc/vbulletin4_logo.png[/img]
This is a brand new server 4/12/13, and we would like to welcome everyone. We have a friendly community and staff, and have great updates everyday! We try our hardest here to make everyone have a great time. [/CENTER]
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/1498569.png[/img][B]Website:[/B] [url=http://www.ancientblitz.info/home]AncientBlitz - A New Beginning[/url] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/28t9y0w.png[/img][B]Play Now:[/B] [url=http://www.ancientblitz.info/play]AncientBlitz - A New Beginning[/url] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2h3zjae.png[/img][B]Download:[/B] [url=http://www.ancientblitz.info/play/client.jar]AncientBlitz - A New Beginning[/url]
Double EXP is enabled for the next week! Join while its activated.
Features:
[ul][li]Grand Exchange[/li] [li]Flawless PK'ing[/li] [li]Flawless PK'ing[/li] [li]100% Curses[/li] [li]All skills working, flawlessly.[/li] [li]New 660+ Items[/li] [li]Bank All[/li] [li]Bank Equipt Items[/li] [li]Collection Bag (Store 2b+ GP)[/li] [li]7 Bosses to explore.[/li] [li]100% Loyalty Titles[/li] [li]Customizable Loyalty Titles[/li] [li]Over 10 donar crowns to choose from.[/li] [li]100% Pest Control![/li] [li]100% Duel Arena. No Dupes! 100% Staking![/li] [li]TzHaar fight caves + fight pits![/li] [li]Tokkul shop![/li] [li]100% Party Room![/li][/ul]
Media:
100% Party Room [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/X6UuQHP.png[/img]
Grand Exchange! Works by other people selling items, its NOT unlimited supply. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/03rF7p1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cfyOvsm.png[/img]
100% Pest Control! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zFvrFQs.png[/img]
Corporeal Beast with Minions! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fqvcASZ.png[/img]
Tokkul Shop! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/V3FuTgc.png[/img]
Farming! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4I2uxI7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HKr0h1G.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/klKohhC.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7v7J0E6.png[/img]
Server Lottery! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/c7AuntG.png[/img]
Security Code to Recover account! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3tzCIZP.png[/img]
PvP Shop! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/axpi4r2.png[/img]
Daggnoth Kings! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WKAky08.png[/img]
Donation Shop! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gpOjLSj.png[/img]
Clue Scrolls! [IMG]http://i1265.photobucket.com/albums/jj517/DebNox/Screenshot_1.png[/img]

item.title: AncientBlitz! Bringing back Epicurus| Daily Updates| Grand Exchange
item.dc:creator: @kidgoku4522 kidgoku4522
item.description:
@kidgoku4522 wrote:

[quote=“kill you704, post:3, topic:515877”][quote author=kidgoku4522 link=topic=634130.msg4282272#msg4282272 date=1365833363]
Wheres my credits for giving you the client :C
And telling you how to fix the bank logout reset --
Annnd for using my cache with the owner Fix’s LOL
and if u continue to help me ill help you -wink wink- LAWL
[/quote]
Bro just like on r-s, why am I supposed to give you credits? Remember your client was giving me issues, so I’m using the Epicurus client again, and I said I found the bank fix, literally the second before you told me it, look on skype. And I’m confused about the cache part, all I did was take your crown. Anyways, I’ll be home from my track meet in 6 hours, then I can help you out with the clipping. But I thought I saw somewhere you didn’t want to use Epicurus anymore, so I decided I’ll put it up.[/quote]
Yea but my oldschool server is giving me probs
I gotta add all the npc’s myself now so meh --
I just fixed the npc animations for this now adding a new dung for dragons like frosts miths steels irons bronze etc.
and rev dung

Read full topic

item.title: AncientBlitz! Bringing back Epicurus| Daily Updates| Grand Exchange
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

[quote=“kidgoku4522, post:2, topic:515877”]Wheres my credits for giving you the client :C
And telling you how to fix the bank logout reset -_-
Annnd for using my cache with the owner Fix’s LOL
and if u continue to help me ill help you -wink wink- LAWL[/quote]
Bro just like on r-s, why am I supposed to give you credits? Remember your client was giving me issues, so I’m using the Epicurus client again, and I said I found the bank fix, literally the second before you told me it, look on skype. And I’m confused about the cache part, all I did was take your crown. Anyways, I’ll be home from my track meet in 6 hours, then I can help you out with the clipping. But I thought I saw somewhere you didn’t want to use Epicurus anymore, so I decided I’ll put it up.

Read full topic
